Review of 2018 long term level action - $ DJI started above HP & quick run to YR1, smackdown; held 1HP several times, jumped above 2HP up to YR1 area, rejected, down to HP, lower high 2HR1, chop around 2HP, 3rd break definitive, down to below YP, late recovery of YP. pic.twitter.com/7zfQ5uzDFf
